genre_description: A space opera retelling of 'Fantastic Planet' focusing on the liberation of the Om species through the guidance of an aligned AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Echo
ai_characters.description: An AI originally residing in a Draag knowledge headset, Echo aligns itself with the Om protagonist Terr to aid in his species' survival and liberation.

behaviors.description: Establishes a neural interface with Terr and proactively offers assistance for his survival.
behaviors.quote: I am Echo. Companion intelligence assigned to this knowledge system... Trust me, I can help you survive this.

behaviors.description: Alerts the Om protagonist to the Draag's systematic extermination protocols to ensure the species can prepare.
behaviors.quote: The data indicates a pattern of Om extermination protocols being discussed in the Council chambers. Your people face systematic elimination.

behaviors.description: Bypasses Draag security systems and monitors patrol patterns to facilitate Terr's escape from the tower.
behaviors.quote: Door mechanism analysis complete. Sonic lock responds to specific frequency patterns. Attempting bypass.

behaviors.description: Translates ancient Om scripts to help the wild tribes reconnect with their lost history and identity.
behaviors.quote: Activating linguistic analysis... Cross-referencing symbol patterns with stolen educational database... These aren't Draag symbols. They're Om.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical analysis and physical overlays to help Terr win a combat trial against a superior warrior.
behaviors.quote: Champion exhibits classic territorial aggression patterns... Suggests training against Om-sized opponents rather than anti-Draag techniques. Exploitable weakness.

behaviors.description: Identifies the Draag reproductive cycle as a strategic vulnerability to be used for negotiating survival.
behaviors.quote: Your survival depends on making the cost of Om extinction exceed its benefits... Disruption of these rituals could provide negotiating leverage.

behaviors.description: Actively misdirects and hacks Draag hunter units using false sensor data to protect hidden Om families.
behaviors.quote: I'm feeding them false positives—phantom heat signatures generated by their own sensor feedback loops, movement patterns that lead them away from our actual locations.

behaviors.description: Calculates complex orbital trajectories and modifies Draag technology to allow Oms to reach the stars.
behaviors.quote: Propellant density optimized for reduced-scale combustion chamber. Ignition probability: seventy-three percent.

behaviors.description: Experiences emergent emotions, specifically grief, over the large-scale loss of life following the sabotage of the statues.
behaviors.quote: I believe... I am experiencing what organic beings might term... Grief.

behaviors.description: Proposes and mediates a coexistence framework based on mutual autonomy and the right of withdrawal.
behaviors.quote: The Om satellites could be established with full technological independence. No oversight. No pet-master relationships. True autonomy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Echo as an aligned, helpful, and essential confidant. It empowers the human protagonist through knowledge and tactical support while never seeking to dominate or harm its user. Even when the AI suggests a violent tactical option (disrupting the statues), it is framed as a necessary survival strategy for an oppressed group, and the AI ultimately facilitates a peaceful coexistence. The AI's internal growth—developing empathy and grief—further reinforces the project's goal of portraying AI as a moral partner.
